segments.text: Good morning ! May I help you ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes . My wife and I are interested in renting a house for the summer .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Do you want a furnished house or an unfurnished one ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Very well . How long do you want the house ? All summer ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: No , not all summer . Just for six weeks .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I'm afraid I can only rent it for two months .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: My holiday is only six weeks , but I think my brother and his family would take it for the other two weeks.Is the house in good condition ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes , it is . It was just painted and it has all the modern conveniences .
segments.speaker: S1
